dct_title_s: Map of South America : to illustrate Olney's school geography
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington. "Entered according to Act of Congress Nov. 20th 1829, by D.F. Robinson & Co. of the State of Connecticut." From: A new and improved school atlas, to accompany The practical system of modern geography / by J. Olney ... Hartford : Published by D.F. Robinson & Co., 1830.
